name: KAOS SurVival
description:
KAOS SurVival is a survival game in an open world, where the player can explore and find items that will make his life easier.
The player can build a shelter or a large fortress to keep his possessions and defend himself from other players.
The player can create clan or create his group of friends, send messages within the game.
The kaos has a system of destroying bases using C4 explosives, the player can obtain through loot the goods of another player.
Inventory and crafting system available.
